title: Build FARMAI Agriculture Platform

requirements.text: Create a landing page with hero section introducing FARMAI as an intelligent agriculture platform, including sections for Problem Statement, Solution Overview, and Key Objectives as described in the project documentation

quotes: FARMAI is an intelligent agriculture-based platform designed to empower farmers by combining Machine Learning with digital decision-support tools

acceptanceCriteria: Landing page displays hero section with FARMAI branding
Problem statement section lists the four key challenges farmers face
Solution overview explains crop prediction, cost estimation, and marketplace features
Objectives section presents all six project objectives clearly

requirements.text: Build a crop prediction interface that accepts environmental and soil parameters (temperature, humidity, rainfall, pH, nitrogen, phosphorus, potassium) and displays AI-recommended crops with mock prediction logic

quotes: AI-driven crop recommendations based on environmental and soil parameters

acceptanceCriteria: Form accepts all seven environmental and soil input parameters
Prediction results display recommended crops with confidence indicators
Mock ML logic provides realistic crop suggestions based on input ranges
Results show why each crop was recommended

requirements.text: Create a cultivation cost estimation calculator that takes crop type, land area, and agricultural inputs (seeds, fertilizers, labor, irrigation, equipment) and calculates total estimated cost with itemized breakdown

quotes: estimates cultivation costs based on predefined agricultural inputs

acceptanceCriteria: Calculator accepts crop selection and land area input
Form includes fields for all five cost categories
Calculation displays itemized cost breakdown
Total cultivation cost is clearly presented

requirements.text: Build a profit prediction calculator that accepts cultivation cost, expected yield (in quintals/kg), and market price per unit, then calculates and displays expected revenue, profit/loss, and profit margin percentage

quotes: predicts expected profit using fixed yield and market price assumptions

acceptanceCriteria: Calculator accepts cultivation cost, yield quantity, and market price inputs
Formula-based calculation: Revenue = Yield Ã— Market Price, Profit = Revenue - Cost
Results show revenue, profit/loss amount, and profit margin percentage
Visual indicator (green/red) shows profit vs loss

requirements.text: Implement a farmer dashboard showing overview cards for total crops managed, estimated profits, active listings in marketplace, and quick access to crop prediction, cost estimation, and profit calculator tools

quotes: give e dash borad and website

acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard displays at least four metric cards with mock data
Quick action buttons navigate to crop prediction, cost calculator, and profit calculator
Dashboard shows recent activity or recommendations section
Layout is clean and easy to navigate

requirements.text: Create a direct marketplace interface where farmers can list crops for sale (crop name, quantity, price, location, contact) and buyers can browse available listings with search and filter capabilities

quotes: direct farmer-to-buyer marketplace, eliminating intermediaries and ensuring fair pricing

acceptanceCriteria: Farmers can add new crop listings with all required fields
Marketplace displays crop cards with image, name, quantity, price, and farmer location
Search and filter functionality by crop type and location
Each listing shows farmer contact information for direct communication

requirements.text: Implement navigation system with links to Home, Dashboard, Crop Prediction, Cost Calculator, Profit Calculator, and Marketplace sections, ensuring smooth routing between all pages
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation menu appears on all pages
All navigation links work correctly
Active page is visually indicated in navigation
Mobile-responsive navigation menu

requirements.text: Apply a cohesive agricultural theme using earth tones (greens, browns, and warm neutrals) inspired by the reference images, with professional typography and consistent spacing throughout the application

quotes: in colour cobination of i gave some reference iamges

acceptanceCriteria: Color palette uses earth tones (greens, browns, warm neutrals) consistently
Typography is professional and readable
Spacing and layout follow consistent design system
Agricultural imagery and icons enhance the theme

requirements.text: Render generated background images, agricultural icons, and crop illustrations as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated directory
acceptanceCriteria: All generated images load from frontend/public/assets/generated
Images display correctly in their designated sections
Fallback handling for missing images

constraints: Use React only, not React with Vite or other build tools
Frontend-only implementation with mock data and logic
No real Machine Learning integration, use rule-based mock predictions
All calculations must be formula-based on the frontend
